DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - Determine activity high-dose methotrexate upfront-window therapy young patient residual ependymoma . Secondary - Assess reason primary surgery complete/incomplete patient . - Assess feasibility toxicity second-look surgery 3 course high-dose methotrexate case initial surgery incomplete . OUTLINE : This multicenter , open-label study . Patients receive high-dose methotrexate IV continuously 24 hour day 0 , 14 , 28 absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients proceed chemotherapy protocol UKCCSG-CNS-9204 . After completion study treatment , patient follow periodically 9 year . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 29 patient accrue study .
